unnormalised: Gurgaon peeps, heads up! That new co-working space, "Innovate Hub," finally opened its doors at Cyber Hub on 20/10/2024. Apparently, it’s right above that famous chai stall, Sharma Ji ki Chai, at Shop No. 12A, DLF Cyber City, Gurgaon, Haryana, 122002. Heard they've got super fast internet and comfy chairs, a total vibe shift from working from home in your pyjamas.
normalised: Gurgaon peeps, heads up! That new co-working space, "Innovate Hub," finally opened its doors at Cyber Hub on twentieth october two thousand and twenty four. Apparently, it’s right above that famous chai stall, Sharma Ji ki Chai, at Shop Number twelve A, D-L-F Cyber City, Gurgaon, Haryana, one two two zero zero two. Heard they've got super fast internet and comfy chairs, a total vibe shift from working from home in your pyjamas.

unnormalised: Spoke to someone who attended the opening event, and they mentioned the place is huge – like, over 10,000 sq ft! Apparently, they also offer virtual office options for smaller businesses, with a mailing address at Building 8, Infinity Tower C, Sector 21, Gurgaon, 122016. Could be a game-changer for startups struggling to find affordable office space.
normalised: Spoke to someone who attended the opening event, and they mentioned the place is huge – like, over ten thousand square feet! Apparently, they also offer virtual office options for smaller businesses, with a mailing address at Building eight, Infinity Tower C, Sector twenty one, Gurgaon, one two two zero one six. Could be a game-changer for startups struggling to find affordable office space.

unnormalised: Anyways, if you're tired of working from cafes or your dining table, Innovate Hub might be worth checking out. Just remember to confirm their pricing structure; someone said they saw a promotional offer for ₹5000/month on LinkedIn, but things change fast, ya know? Happy working, folks!
normalised: Anyways, if you're tired of working from cafes or your dining table, Innovate Hub might be worth checking out. Just remember to confirm their pricing structure; someone said they saw a promotional offer for rupee five thousand per month on LinkedIn, but things change fast, ya know? Happy working, folks!
